comments:
We have an automated test bot that runs the tests every hour or so.  Twice in the past two days I've seen a failure in ImportExistingTest.  The failure is intermittent -- asking the bot to run it again simply results in all tests passing.  It seems like there might be a timing problem in the test itself.

Do all 3 tests fail on the same run?  Or is it a different test(s) each time?  I haven't been able to replicate by just running the UITestSuite on a Linux box in the lab.
Different test fails on different runs.

Created an attachment (id=30486)
apply patch to ImportExistingTest.java

Try this patch - it will report which files it is expecting but were not found in the workspace.  

Also, I noticed that an extra folder is likely being checked for when it shouldn't be in the three import from directory test cases (another project folder was added to the test data archive file after the patch was submitted and the code wasn't altered to account for that - not sure how the tests ever passed if this is why the failures are occuring).
I've ran the suites a dozen times and it's all green.  Patch submitted.
Verified in I20051213-0010.  Ran the UI Test suite and all tests passed on Win2000
